metas.description: The full race card for the 2012 Jewson novices Chase at the Cheltenham Festival including odds and form.

page.content:
Jewson Novices Chase Race Card 2012

The Jewson Novices Chase is the first race on the card on day 3 of the Cheltenham Festival and it is a brand new race this season with a distance of 2m 5f on offer for the Novice Chasers. With it being a new race there a very few trends for punters to study meaning that the full race card will be a great aid for punters wanting to have a bet on the race. The Card will feature each runner and their odds and a form guide for punters to study, it will a comprehensive guide and will be available on race day.

Jewson Novices Chase Race Card 2013
